response.answer_text: Read the blog ERP Implementation: Do You Have a Strategic Plan for Execution? You would not find any book exactly on this particular topic. You can refer PMBOK guide for Project Management and CBA guides for Business Analysis for basic guidelines and methodology. For implementing an ERP(Features) you would have to look at the documentation published by the manufacturer.
